channel.title: Were do i put this int?

item.title: Were do i put this int?
item.dc:creator: @dracar dracar
item.description:
@dracar wrote:

ok it needs to go into playerhandler.java


public int getID(String name)
    {
        for(int a = 0; a < players.length; a++)
        {
            if(players[a] != null)
            {
                if(players[a].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name))
                {
                    return a;
                }
            }
        }
        return -1;
